html:
Basic Plan Features

Core Functionality: Access to essential tools for individual project management.

User Access: Limited to 5 users per account, ideal for small team collaboration.

Support: Standard email support with a guaranteed 48-hour response time.

Reporting: Basic dashboard with standard, pre-defined performance metrics.

Integrations: Access to 5 standard third-party application integrations.

Security: Standard security protocols including two-factor authentication.

Onboarding: Self-service onboarding through our extensive online knowledge base.

Professional Plan Features

Core Functionality: All Basic features plus advanced collaboration and workflow tools.

User Access: Supports up to 50 users with granular, role-based permission controls.

Support: Priority email and chat support with a 24-hour response time target.

Reporting: Customizable dashboards and advanced analytics for deeper insights.

Integrations: Includes premium integrations with key business systems like Salesforce.

Security: Enhanced security features including detailed audit logs and data encryption.

Onboarding: Guided onboarding session with a dedicated customer success specialist.

Enterprise Plan Features

Core Functionality: Full suite of features including portfolio management and forecasting.

User Access: Unlimited users with SSO integration and advanced user provisioning.

Support: Dedicated account manager and 24/7 phone support with a 1-hour SLA.

Reporting: Bespoke reporting, BI tool integration, and predictive analytics engine.

Integrations: Custom API access and tailored integrations developed for your tech stack.

Security: Advanced compliance controls (SOC 2, HIPAA) and a private cloud option.

Onboarding: A fully customized implementation and training program for your teams.
